item.title: Cryptographic Material
item.description: Some Finalizers, which, as the name implies, finalize the successful execution of the pipeline, can generated signed objects, like a JWT, to be forwarded to the upstream services. In such cases Heimdall acts as an issuer of such objects and needs at least corresponding key material.
